channel.title: Comments on: Three Events that Brought Me Here
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Janice
item.dc:creator: Janice
item.content:encoded:
I can’t believe I read this just now.
Now everything about you makes sense. Thanks for sharing this.
Reading this while Looking back by Kerry Muzzey was playing on my iPod was such a bad combination :((

Great story, Ted.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Sam! I hope UC hasn’t been that much of a problem. It does make me feel good to hear others that have the same or very similar ailments are doing so well in life. I’ve met more than a few that gave up and let it consume them. No way to live!

Again, thank you everyone for the great comments. I enjoyed sharing this and having the opportunity to write it.

item.title: By: Sam
item.dc:creator: Sam
item.content:encoded:
SQLChicken on Twitter linked to this and I decided to read for…some reason. I immediately identified with the punk rock/skating/drinking part – I was never that hardcore or homeless, but I know the scene and love the music. However, when I saw that you have Crohn’s, I knew exactly what you were talking about that it’s responsible for you being where you are, because I have Ulcerative Colitis. Wrapping it up with your wife, well, I agree there, too (but, you know, about my wife;) because she helped me up so many times, and continues to do so.

Thanks for posting this. Keep it up. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.content:encoded:
“My future looks very promising because of the people I have around me. “

Amen, and likewise!

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: I feel so lucky I know you.
item.content:encoded: I feel so lucky I know you.

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: I can think of more than a few people who could learn from your life-changing experiences - all for the better, I might add. Thanks for sharing.
item.content:encoded: I can think of more than a few people who could learn from your life-changing experiences – all for the better, I might add. Thanks for sharing.

item.title: By: traingamer
item.dc:creator: traingamer
item.description: That explains the skateboard imagery. Well done.
item.content:encoded: That explains the skateboard imagery. Well done.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Thanks! In all and looking back I wouldn't have changed a thing. I think that helps a great deal when it comes to going forward.
item.content:encoded: Thanks! In all and looking back I wouldn’t have changed a thing. I think that helps a great deal when it comes to going forward.
